<p style="text-align: justify"> I am interested in how the languages we speak interact with each other, and how this interaction may change our representation of these languages. My research concerns the intersection of bilingualism, cross-language interactions, and language change. I study these issues using psycholinguistic and sociolinguistic methods and, hopefully soon, computational methods. </p>
